package.name: cmake
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} sed -i '/"lib64"/s/64//' Modules/GNUInstallDirs.cmake jobcount=2 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then DISTCC_HOSTS="$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" export DISTCC_HOSTS jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi ./configure --prefix=/usr --no-qt-gui --system-curl --system-expat --system-zlib --system-bzip2 --system-libarchive --parallel=4 ./configure --prefix=/usr --no-qt-gui --system-curl --system-expat --system-zlib --system-bzip2 --system-libarchive --parallel=4 # sed -i 's%/usr/lib/libncurses.so%%g' Source/CMakeFiles/ccmake.dir/build.make # sed -i 's%/usr/lib64/libncurses.so%%g' Source/CMakeFiles/ccmake.dir/build.make make -j $jobcount cmake make -j $jobcount ccmake make -j $jobcount make
